thread.title: NRG Energy Unveils Moves to Reduce Debt, Cut Costs
thread.title_full: NRG Energy Unveils Moves to Reduce Debt, Cut Costs - WSJ

author: Chelsey Dulaney
title: NRG Energy Unveils Moves to Reduce Debt, Cut Costs
text:
Power producer NRG Energy Inc. on Friday unveiled a series of moves to cut down on debt, buy back shares, and raise cash through an asset sale, as the company faces pressure over its expensive clean-energy businesses.
NRG said it has agreed to sell a 75% stake in its portfolio of wind farms to its majority-owned affiliate company, NRG Yield Inc., for $210 million. NRG has been able to “drop down” projects with long-term, predictable... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
